organic.title: Home | Redwood Gospel Mission | United States
organic.snippet: We partner with local churches in both Sonoma County and Mendocino County to serve the poor and needy in our community. Your support makes a difference.

organic.snippet: If you are in need of assistance with a meal, safe shelter,. a life controlling issue, or if you need prayer, we are here for you.
